column2: Xephyr -nolock -s 480 -screen 1920x1080 :9 & export DISPLAY=:9 && icecat -private -width 1920 -height 1080 & obs & baobab & exit
killall picom && picom -b && dunstify Picom Reloaded
xdotool keydown super alt key m keyup super alt
xdotool keydown super shift key r keyup super shift
bspc node -g sticky && bspc node -t floating
